fullText:
Wild Wrath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Elf, elven accuracy power, invoker, Covenant of Wrath class feature
Benefit: When you use elven accuracy to reroll an encounter or daily invoker attack power, any target you hit with the reroll takes 4 extra damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 42.
name: Wild Wrath
